Nice and clean beach with easy access. Parking is bit of a problem.
My first real visit to the ocean and able to feel the waves crashing on my feet. Plenty of room to view the ocean. The pier is a legend. Plenty of shopping, eating and gazing.
You will see a lot of birds and often sea life. The business area is always a blast to walk through -- shop or eat -- it is all there.
Always a good spot to visit, especially at sunset. It sums up what being near the ocean is all about. It's also a great place to take pictures.
Lots of different vendors set up at the pier. Great place to bring the family for fun on the beach and in the water. Beautiful FIREWORKS display!
This town and especially the beach and pier is pretty much taken over by the Pokemon craze. Appears to be a lot of fun for the kids..

For a "seaside atmosphere, this is the place to eat. The food is superb & the atmosphere is pleasant.
